author: Xbox
description:
Slay your way in Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree, a dark fantasy action RPG coming to Xbox Series X|S on April 17, 2025. Wield blades and magic to battle nightmarish creatures, craft powerful weapons and upgrades, and explore a vast, ruined world before Entropy consumes it.

Wishlist Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/mandragora/9pdk46p3ptqm

author: Xbox
description:
Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land will be available on March 21, 2025 for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One. 

Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land follows the adventures of Yumia Liessfeldt and her companions as they set off on a journey to unravel the mysteries behind the cataclysm that destroyed the once great continent of Aladiss, resulting in alchemy becoming taboo.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/atelier-yumia-the-alchemist-of-memories-the-envisioned-land/9P6BBFRV8QWN

description:
Director Motohide Eshiro, also the original director of Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny (2002), discusses the game's exhilarating sword-fighting action, and new features unique to this remastered edition.

author: Xbox
description:
The time has come to walk the path of the Soul Reaper. Let’s pray this won’t be our last meeting.

📖 Don the hakama of Ichigo Kurosaki and relive unforgettable moments of the Bleach manga series in story mode.
⚔️ Select your fighter from a cast of over 30 playable characters from the series’ 20-year history.
🆚Challenge your friends to intense 1v1 battles with local and online multiplayer support.

ACCEPT YOUR SOUL AND REVERSE FATE.
BLEACH Rebirth of Souls is available now on Xbox Series X|S.
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/game/9PJK7WPHWM8L 

BLEACH Rebirth of Souls DELUXE EDITION includes 1 week of Early Access, Season Pass, and additional Soul Crystals.
Upgrade to the ULTIMATE EDITION to also receive 5 THOUSAND-YEAR BLOOD WAR and 5 REBIRTH OF SOULS COSTUME SETS.
#BLEACH #RebirthofSouls #BLEACHRoS

author: Xbox
description:
Relaxing 3D Narrative Adventure Mythwrecked: Ambrosia Island is now available on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One with Xbox Game Pass!

Step on the sunny beaches of long-lost Ambrosia island — home to the Greek gods. Befriend them and earn their favor. Use their godly powers to help you hunt for treasures and learn more about this mysterious island. Uncover its mystery to help them regain their forgotten identities and find your way home.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/mythwrecked-ambrosia-island/9nc4x3lp87tn
